channel.title: Out by the Lab
channel.description: Out by the Lab by Ben Reeves

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 44
item.description: Straight out of the unreleased Out By The Lab fighting game.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 43
item.description: Brocolli just wants hugs.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 42
item.description: Piff

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 41
item.description: Smacky! Nooooooooo!

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 40
item.description: Oh Sam, there's always a way to miss.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 39
item.description: Upside down Sam is unexpectedly fun to draw.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 38
item.description: Fwip!

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 37
item.description: This sequence was originally written with them dealing with zucchini and corn separately, but then I realized how much more fun it was to have them thrown into total chaos.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 36
item.description: Time to squash our hero's hopes.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 35
item.description: Notice my self control in restraining myself from making corny jokes.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 34
item.description: I like how unbothered Wolfie is by this; he's a good friend.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 33
item.description: Broccoli can't handle the drama, he's just a sensitive soul.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 32
item.description: I know, it's a shocking turn of events.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 31
item.description: In my head, I am reacting exactly like broccoli every time I see a cute puppy.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 30
item.description: What's this? Vampires aren't allowed to hold crosses! Shouldn't she be on fire or something right now?

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 29
item.description: It's fine that Same isn't paying attention. I'm sure it wasn't important and won't come up later.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 28
item.description: I had originally written Que's weapon as being more gun-like; I even have a few sketches of something very different. I have specific rules about how "magic" works in this universe, though, and I was having a hard time making it work. Then I thought about what Que would find on hand. So yeah, here we are.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 27
item.description: Those mutants are sure to be beaten now!

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 26
item.description: I was originally going to have Wolfie be in his human form for this sequence but I thought it might be too jarring to introduce that so suddenly.

item.title: Aside - A Beginning - Part 4
item.description: End of aside. Eventually we get a nicer Sam that eats sugar instead of blood. Que never forgets Sam's natural state, though.

item.title: Aside - A Beginning - Part 3
item.description: I was originally going to have this really complicated thing where it was like a dead man's switch and Que had to NOT push the button for the thing to happen. But then I realized that this story has to fit in 4 pages for the printed zine format and that, really, sometimes simple is just better.

item.title: Aside - A Beginning - Part 2
item.description: Yeah, yeah, yeah, I heard you. Go make a sandwich or something.

item.title: Aside - A Beginning - Part 1
item.description: FOOM

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 25
item.description: End of Gamma Garden part 1. Part 2 will bring us back to the garden and wrap things up. I have a few things to work on before part 2 starts up so it may be a little bit before you see another comic.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 24
item.description: I think stairs are generally difficult for Wolfie to navigate.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 23
item.description: No one can push buttons the way family can.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 22
item.description: Other possible titles: The Book of Government Paperwork, The Book of Delicious Food, The Book of Political Discourse.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 21
item.description: Whoops.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 20
item.description: Dr. Que? More like Dr. Killjoy.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 19
item.description: Trying to figure out how to work with a semi-transparent character with white outlines. It's trickier than I thought it was going to be.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 18
item.description: Penn doesn't have a lot of sympathy for Que's condition.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 17
item.description: Instant ghost maker.

item.title: Gamma Garden - Page 16
item.description: Sam's response to that machine is a direct quote from my daughter.
